content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    region,count(customer_id) as customer_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsglobalaayush.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsecontainer/customer.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY region
